author: Special Correspondent
text:
Textiles and Handlooms Minister S. Gokula Indira has been appointed as the secretary of the AIADMK women’s wing on Wednesday.

In a statement, party general secretary Jayalalithaa relieved L. Sasikala Pushpa, M.P, from the post.

Meanwhile Ms. Jayalalithaa announced that the party's IT wing will hold district-level conferences from January 9 to 26.

The objective was to maximise the reach of social network to the party’s advantage in the elections.
title: New chief for AIADMK women’s wing
